summary: A collection of unit tests that verify IAM OpenID Connect provider operations—such as creation, deletion, retrieval, listing, tagging, and updating—using a mocked AWS environment. The tests also exercise various error scenarios, pagination handling, and quota limits.
business_intent: Ensure that IAM OIDC provider management functions behave correctly and handle edge cases when interacting with AWS services, providing confidence in the reliability of the IAM integration layer.
